content: florestan socks by caoua coffee materials 370m/400yds 430m/470yds fingering weight sock yarn sample regia silk 55% wool 20% poly 20% silk needles 2 25mm / us1 or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle size adult small to medium medium-large gauge 32 sts / 46 row= 10cm/4 inches in stockinette abbreviations k = knit stitch k2tog = knit 2 together kfb = knit into front and back of stitch p = purl stitch p2tog = purl 2 together rs = right side / public side sl yb = slip_stitch as if to purl with yarn in back back = the side away from you sl yf = slip_stitch as if to purl with yarn in front front = the side closest to you ssk = slip 1 knit wise slip 1 purl wise knit both stitches together through the back loops st s = stitch es ws = wrong side / private side ©caoua coffee 2017 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved florestan v 1 page 1/6 florestan socks - by caoua coffee cables - instructions for cabling without a cable needle 2/1 lc = 3 stitch left leaning cable also known as 2 over 1 left cross or c3f cross 3 front approaching from the back insert the tip of the right needle into the back of the 3rd stitch on the left needle drop 3 sts off the left needle and pick up the 2 loose stitches from the front with the left needle transfer 1 stitch back from right needle to left needle k3 1/2 rc = 3 stitch right leaning cable also known as 2 over 1 right cross or c3b cross 3 back approaching from the front insert the tip of the right needle into the 2nd and 3rd stitch on the left needle as if to purl drop 3 sts off the left needle and pick up the 1 loose stitch from the back with the left needle transfer 2 stitches back from right needle to left needle k3 2/2 lc = 4 stitch left leaning cable also known as 2 over 2 left cross or c4f cable 4 front approaching from the back insert the tip of the right needle into the back of the 3rd and 4th stitch on the left needle drop 4 sts off the left needle and pick up the 2 loose stitches from the front with the left needle transfer 2 stitches back from right needle to left needle k4 2/2 rc = 4 stitch right leaning cable also known as 2 over 2 right cross or c4b cable 4 back approaching from the front insert the tip of the right needle into the 3rd and 4th stitch on the left needle as if to purl drop 4 sts off the left needle and pick up the 2 loose stitches from the back with the left needle transfer 2 stitches back from right needle to left needle k4 pattern before you start the cable
